Package controllerGui

Class ClientsReportController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllerGui.ClientsReportController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScreen
    public class ClientsReportController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScreen
    This class is responsible for providing the functionality for the clients report screen in the GUI. It displays data from a ClientsReportEntity in the form of bar charts and pie charts.
    Author:
    David
    See Also:
    ClientsReportEntity, IScreen
